title: Ep. 438: Skin Cycling, Makeup-Free Miss England, Daxxify & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 438: Skin Cycling, Makeup-Free Miss England, Daxxify & The Week’s Beauty News
description:
Should you be cycling your skincare? And is it just a fad or actually good for your complexion? We discuss! Plus, let’s talk about the first Miss England contestant to compete without makeup; the cosmetic injectable Daxxify; water-based perfume; Emface (a non-invasive facial tightening treatment); and why ColourPop Cosmetics thought a collaboration with J.K. Rowling’s Harry Potter was a good idea. Plus, a listener tried Hailey Bieber’s favorite Paula Choice serum and tells us how it went.

  • Products & people mentioned on Ep. 438: shopmy.us/collections/73520
  • Episode recap, links, and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
